name: Smellows Adventure
description:
This is just two levels I made to test the features of the Corgi Engine. Smellow is a happy marshmallow dude who has to deal with some angry dinosaurs. Everything here was drawn and animated super fast to learn how to use the engine, its not exactly a masterpiece. I recommend playing with a controller, but keyboard is supported. 

Controller- 

  • RT: Shoot
  • A: Jump (2x to double jump)
  • Y: Roll
  • X: Run
  • RStick: Aim weapon
  • Down + Jump: Go through platforms

Keyboard-

  • E: Shoot
  • A & D- Move left and right
  • F: Roll
  • SPace: Jump
  • Shift: Run
